overview.name: Dell Official Website
overview.description: The official website of Dell, the manufacturer of Alienware products

overview.name: Amazon
overview.description: A popular online marketplace where various retailers and sellers offer products.

overview.name: Best Buy
overview.description: A consumer electronics retailer that may carry Alienware monitors.

overview.name: Newegg
overview.description: An online electronics retailer known for a wide selection of computer hardware.

overview.name: B&H Photo Video, New York
overview.description: A retailer specializing in electronics and photography equipment in New York.

overview.name: Micro Center
overview.description: A chain of computer and electronics stores with both physical locations and an online store.

overview.name: Adorama
overview.description: An online retailer specializing in photography and electronics.

overview.name: Walmart Supercenter, New York
overview.description: A major retail chain that may offer the product both online and physical store.

location.address: 77 Green Acres Rd S, Valley Stream, NY 11581

overview.name: Staples, New York
overview.description: A chain retailer offering brand-name electronics & print services both online and physical store.

overview.name: eBay
overview.description: An online auction and shopping website where new and used products can be purchased.

overview.name: Dell Headquater, Texas
overview.description: This is where Dell's headquater is located, and it serves as a major hub for the company's operations, including production and produc distribution.

overview.name: Dell China Co Ltd./Xiamen
overview.description: This is Dell's manufacturing site in Xiamen China. Xiamen is a major industrial city in Fujian Province known for its electornic manufacturing capabilities. Dell's presence in China includes manufacturing operations for many products, such as computers.

location.address: 2388 Jinshang Road, Huli District, Xiamen, Fujian, China

overview.name: Dell's Alienware retail store
overview.description: A retail store for Dell's Alienware branch in Beijing, China. The store offers a range of Dell's product, such as computers, laptops, monitors, and accessories, as well as providing costumer service.

location.address: 20, Da Ruanfu Hutong, Dongcheng District, Beijing, China

overview.name: The Asia Pacific Customer Centre2 (APCC2)
overview.description: Dell's factory, constumer service and support center in Penang, Malaysia. It serves costumers in the Asia-Pacific reigion, providing assistance with sales inquiries, technical support, product information, and warranty services.

location.address: Jalan Bukit Tengah, Bukit Minyak, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia 14000

overview.name: Dell's Austin Assembly Plant
overview.description: One of Dell Technology's major manufacturing facility is located in Austin, Texas, USA. The Austin factory plays a significant role in Dell's manufacturing operations, producing a range of products for international and domestic distribution.

overview.name: Dell Ireland
overview.description: One of Dell's oversea headquaters in Europe. This facility oversees Dell's operations across Europe, the Middle East, and Africa with Dublin being a strategic location for Dell's logistics and supply chain operations in Europe, facilitating the distribution of products to customers and partners throughout the region.

overview.name: Dell Direct, Texas
overview.description: Dell Technologies may sell the Alienware AW2720 directly through its online platform, using its own logistics system or partner delivery services, such as FedEx or UPS, to ship directly to consumers. This direct distribution method can reduce intermediate links and improve distribution efficiency.

overview.name: UPS Los Angeles Facilit
overview.description: UPS (United Parcel Service) is another major logistics and package delivery company, known for its reliable service and extensive distribution network. UPS is able to offer a variety of delivery options, including next-day delivery, to help speed the Alienware AW2720 to consumers.

location.address: 10690 Santa Monica Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90025​

overview.name: Fed Ex seattle
overview.description: FedEx is a global leader in express delivery and logistics services, offering a broad range of distribution solutions. For delivery of the Alienware AW2720, Dell may partner with FedEx to leverage its global network to get products to consumers quickly and accurately.

overview.name: Amazon Logistics
overview.description: If the Alienware AW2720 is sold through the Amazon platform, Amazon's logistics services can be used to handle the fulfillment and delivery of the order. Amazon has an efficient delivery system that can provide fast delivery services, including same-day delivery and next-day delivery services, to ensure that customers receive products quickly.

location.address: 462 Hazelwood Logistics Center Dr, Hazelwood, MO 63042, United States​

overview.name: Best Buy Store Pickup, New York
overview.description: For the Alienware AW2720 purchased through Best Buy, consumers have the option to order online and pick it up at their nearest physical store. This "buy online, pick up in-store" model not only provides convenience for consumers, but also increases in-store opportunities and boosts sales of other products.

overview.name: DHL Express Shanghai
overview.description: The DHL Shanghai facility, located in China's commercial and logistics hub, is one of DHL's key logistics hubs in the Asia-Pacific region. The center provides a full range of logistics services, including international express delivery, freight, supply chain management, and uses its advanced technology and extensive network to ensure the efficient and safe transportation of goods to all parts of the world.

location.address: 1050 Waimalu Rd, 董家渡 Huangpu, Shanghai, China, 200010

overview.name: DHL New York Gateway
overview.description: DHL is one of the world's leading logistics companies, providing international express, freight (including air, sea and land) and supply chain solutions. As part of the Deutsche Post DHL Group, DHL has a network of operations in more than 220 countries and territories, leveraging its extensive global reach, advanced logistics technology and deep industry expertise to provide customized logistics services to businesses of all sizes.

location.address: Jfk Int'L Airport, S Cargo Rd Bldg 263, Queens, NY 11430

overview.name: Kuehne + Nagel Shanghai
overview.description: Kuehne + Nagel is a leading global logistics and transportation company known for its professional services in sea, air, land, contract logistics and supply chain solutions.

location.address: 5/6F, No. 14, Lane 1401 Jiangchang Road, Jing’an District, Shanghai 200436, P.R. China.
